author: lukegriffith
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
run static method System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser.ParseFile(..)
```

        public static List<ScriptParameters> GetParameters(string Path) 
        {

            Token[] tokens;
            ParseError[] errors; 
            List<ScriptParameters> ParamCollection = new List<ScriptParameters>();

            // method fails due to low level API call.q
            var ast = System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser.ParseFile(Path, out tokens, out errors);

            

            if (errors.Length != 0)
            {

                throw new NotImplementedException();
            }

            foreach (var p in ast.ParamBlock.Parameters)
            {
                ParamCollection.Add(new ScriptParameters(){ Name = p.Name.ToString(), StaticType = p.StaticType.ToString() });
            }

            return ParamCollection;

        }
    
```

Debugging at the NonImplementedException, errors contains details of failed dependency.

"The file could not be read: Unable to load DLL 'api-ms-win-core-localization-l1-2-0.dll': The specified module or one of its dependencies could not be found.\n (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)."

the error id reports: "FileReadError"

Expected behavior
-----------------
Parses .ps1 script file, and return a language Ast 

Actual behavior
---------------
returns a missing dependency on 'api-ms-win-core-localization-l1-2-0.dll' (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)."

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

At this point, I'm not actually in PowerShell - I'm in DotNetCore, Please let me know if I should re-raise under the DotNetCore project.

```powershell
PS /Users/luke/GitHub/JekyllBlog_Config> $PsVersionTable                                                                                                                             

Name                           Value                                                                                                                                                
----                           -----                                                                                                                                                
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta                                                                                                                                           
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                                                                                 
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0                                                                                                                                              
CLRVersion                                                                                                                                                                          
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.1                                                                                                                                        
OS                             Darwin 16.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 16.5.0: Fri Mar  3 16:52:33 PST 2017; root:xnu-3789.51.2~3/RELEASE_X86_64                                        
Platform                       Unix                                                                                                                                                 
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                                                              
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                                                  
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                                                                              
WSManStackVersion              3.0     

```

csproj contains the following

```
  <PropertyGroup>
    <TargetFramework>netcoreapp2.0</TargetFramework>
    <IsPackable>false</IsPackable>
  </PropertyGroup>
  <ItemGroup>
    <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk" Version="15.3.0-preview-20170427-09" />
    <PackageReference Include="system.management.automation" Version="6.0.0-beta.1" />
    <PackageReference Include="xunit" Version="2.2.0" />
    <PackageReference Include="xunit.runner.visualstudio" Version="2.2.0" />
  </ItemGroup>
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: /cc @daxian-dbw Could you please comment the Issue?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @lukemgriffith This is because the NuGet packages published to `powershell-core` feed only contain windows-plat specific runtime assemblies. #3417 is tracking the Unix-plat NuGet packages. Please comment/discuss in that issue.

title: MacOs missing dependency on System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser.ParseFile
